text: {{tr:3k_captive_option_tooltip_recruit_disabled}}
I have heard that they suspect a spy within their ranks. I therefore request extraction before I am discovered.
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_positive}}
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_neutral}}
{{tr:captive_option_dont_extract_undercover_character}}
My family will avenge me should I die!
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_negative}}
I have served you loyally... You wouldn't kill me, would you?
There is still much I can achieve within their faction. Release me back into their fold so I can continue to serve our cause.
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_negative}}
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_positive}}
{{tr:captive_option_extract_undercover_character_and_convalesce}}
{{tr:3k_captive_option_tooltip_recruit_disabled}}
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_negative}}
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_positive}}
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_negative}}
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_negative}}
I have long sought a worthy master to banish the chaos. Allow me to lend my talents to your cause.
If you spare me, I shall return to take my vengeance upon you!
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_negative}}
My honour is too precious to me to fight alongside one of such low character. Do what you will!
{{tr:3k_captive_option_tooltip_recruit_disabled}}
{{tr:3k_captive_option_tooltip_recruit_disabled}}
I would rather die than betray my cause!
I relish the opportunity to finally face our enemy. Give the word and my retinue will fight for you in the coming battle!
If you plan to kill me, then kill me.
You may kill me, but others shall follow in my footsteps.
My people look to me as their leader, I cannot abandon them.
I would rather not face my friends in battle. I therefore request to withdraw from the field and escape homeward.
You are deluded if you think I will join you. I do not forgive past insults, even if it means my life is forfeit!
We have friends in common. I offer my services to you for the benefit of China.
There is no sense in fighting anymore.
You would kill your own flesh and blood?
Only by killing me will you be spared my vengeance!
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_positive}}
I am the heir of my faction, I cannot walk away from that.
{{tr:3k_captive_option_tooltip_recruit_disabled}}
My honour is too precious to me to fight alongside one of such low character. Do what you will!
{{tr:3k_captive_option_tooltip_recruit_disabled}}
I would rather die than betray my cause!
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_positive}}
If I must remain undercover to support your plans, then so be it!
Kill me, or release me; these are your only options.
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_positive}}
Spare my life and I will be indebted to you.
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_positive}}
{{tr:3k_captive_option_tooltip_recruit_disabled}}
We have friends in common. I offer my services to you for the benefit of China.
If you want surrender, you'll have it.
You may kill me, but not my ideals.
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_positive}}
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_negative}}
{{tr:3k_relationship_effect_positive}}
{{tr:captive_option_extract_undercover_character_and_reinforce}}
{{tr:3k_captive_option_tooltip_recruit_disabled}}
Allow me to join you and I will serve you well.
